content: How do I change my email address on this site. I get no email notifications because I believe the address is wrong. Cant figure out how to change it though. Settings does not seem to cut the mustard.
Can the address be modified on the back end?

It would be nice if people could change email addresses. Otherwise, when you do an "@", you get multiple representations of the same person - and no clear idea of which one you should use. @Josh Mandel Is this something we can propose for a future version?
already implemented in the current version the Zulip community themselves are using
Indeed, this has been implemented in the latest version of Zulip (see https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/734)
Always a good idea to do... not in the time leading up to a WGM! Maybe mid-July is a good target?
